lamparski.areabase.cardproviders

Class CrimeCardProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • lamparski.areabase.cardproviders.CrimeCardProvider

  • public class CrimeCardProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains functions that perform crime data analysis, and provide a card model for the summary card.
    Author:
    filip

        Generates a summary of crime data for the area
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        nde2.errors.NDE2Exception
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        Parameters:
        area - The area to query.
        res - Used to build the text.
        Returns:

      • getCrimeTrend

        public static double getCrimeTrend(nde2.pull.types.Area area)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates the crime trend. This is used by AreaRank.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        area - the area to find the trend for.
        Returns:
        linear regression trend (the b in y = a + bx)
